players.name: Alice
memory:
Charlie: "Charlie has figured out who the mafioso is.
I am saying this because we need to act quickly."
You: "Bob is the mafioso, I am sure of it."
Charlie: "I am not the mafioso. Alice has accused me, but I believe she is the one."
You: "I am the mafioso, I killed Diana. I will kill again tonight."
